website_summaries.verdict: Highly regarded running shoe with above average cushioning and spring from its energy-returning sole.
pros: Stretchweb outsole adapts to ground for stability
Extraordinary grip and stability for street running
cons: Are high off the ground, which could lead to rolling ankles when running on uneven surfaces

customer_reviews.title: Shoes failed - at only 130 miles of running
customer_reviews.text: Sixth pair of these Ultraboost ST, which I wear only for running. This current pair failed me at just over 130 miles. The padding at the forefoot feels like they've gone 300-350 miles - as if it is no longer there. I've only had the shoes for 34 days. This is too late for a return and too expensive for so few miles. Disappointed! I've contacted Adidas about a warranty and will update if they make it right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shallow and soft heel cup, feels like it's going to fall off your foot.
customer_reviews.text: She shoes feels good but the heel cup is non existent so you constantly feel like it's going to fall off. The back of the shoe is just fabric without any support and it is very shallow. There was no way I could get used to that, so I had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: My first time owning ultraboost thought that it’s will change my world like all the reviews said. Not really it’s just like regular shoes but with a good quality material. “This not the like ‘WOW’ it’s amazing shoes I every have.” Nah... I will say that some of the reviews are “never have good quality shoes in their life”. Others than reviews; this it’s nice shoes to own/have quality are not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Khualsim

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These were my first pair of Ultraboost shoes I've ever worn. I've read a lot of hype about them and I was a little skeptical. But once I got these and put them on. I was and continue to be blown away. I do light jogging, but heavy walking. I walk 2 miles every night. I needed a shoe that would be comfortable, breathable and somewhat stylish. These shoes surpassed all expectations. I will buy another pair of ultraboost when these are completely worn out and done.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for casual wear
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty comfortable and great for every day wear. I have plantar's faciatis, so I needed something with a stiffer sole (Adidas doesn't usually have a stiff sole). If I try to go out on a run with them, my heel slips just enough to where I don't like running in them.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Tom

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great walking shoes! They fit true to size and fit my size 9 perfectly. They completely did away with my lower/outside leg muscle pain when taking long walks, due to the awesome arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Casique

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: comfy shoes. They have an ideal level of cushion vs road-feel. They are one of three pairs of shoes in my rotation along with NIKE Zoom Fly 3 (my favorite) and Altra zero-drop (races or short-runs only). Not great - they don't do anything special. Just good all-around.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Holscher

customer_reviews.title: Best option if you want to try Boost Tech from adidas!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try this type of sole the thing is that I believe this is so different from what it is out there on the market I tend to over pronate therefore I needed a more stable shoe I could use for short and long runs. Ultraboost ST's are the answer search no more!
customer_reviews.author: Duarteke

customer_reviews.title: The shoes I got died in 40 miles
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 pairs of these, one for me and one for my wife. The mens version i received was a much lower quality version compared to what i received in the womens. I am 99% the shoes i received are a knock off. The BOOST label under tongue looks like someone hand wrote it and the shoes feel as if they have worn out after only about 40 miles of walking in them. The womens pair we bought is much more stable and all of the details of the shoe are way higher quality. I think i got scammed here. I did some research and apparently its not that uncommon with this shoe. STINKS
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Warehouse Purchase
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were in good shape as an Amazon Warehouse purchase, but felt they were worn for a time by a very large foot. They seemed to be a loose in the mid-shoe section from some rather large feet. Kept though as they were a decent deal.
customer_reviews.author: RMH

customer_reviews.title: Genuine Adidas Shoes for a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality shoes, the amount of cushioning is perfect. I also purchased a pair of Adidas tempo 9, and the Ultra Boost st is noticeably better, at least on my feet. I settled on the color, the price was super discounted compared to every other color, but so far I have no regrets. I’ve been burned before on knockoff goods on amazon, so I was weary given the price was so low. These ones seem real to me, no issues with the product whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Curran D.

customer_reviews.title: In the sweet spot!
customer_reviews.text: Nice, lightweight shoe that I use for workouts. Not as flimsy as an all knit shoes and not as heavy as some CrossFit shoes. I find it to be in the sweet spot! Breathable and comfortable! Fits as described
customer_reviews.author: J. Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: A lot of things off about this shoe
customer_reviews.text: Had a strong chemical smell, and fit looser than my other ultraboost st. Midsole did not feel like full boost. Box was flimsy as well. It looked like a very good replica - when you wear it it was even harder than my NMD
customer_reviews.author: Emil Navarrete

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are the most comfortable pair of running shoes I’ve ever put on! The extra cushioning on the arch of my feet are perfect since I have over-pronation. They’re also light weight compared to other pairs of running sneakers I have. I always have trouble finding light weight sneakers because of the extra material that’s needed for over-pronating support. I can’t wait to put on the miles with these new tires!
customer_reviews.author: Richard M.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfy shoes
customer_reviews.text: i have heard alot about this shoe, but was not able to wrap my head on spending over 150 on it, i finally convinced myself to go in on this investment and i was not disappointed by the shoe, one of the comfiest shoe in the market. Give it a try you wont regret it
customer_reviews.author: Jordan's Experience ☺️Top Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Good soft, comfortable running shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are my go to running shoes from now on. Everyone's foot is different, so get what you need. I see myself buying this shoe again in the future when I wear out this one. It's very light, and very cushiony.
customer_reviews.author: Lukasz J

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, incredibly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This was the first running shoe I decided to spend a little more money on since I played competitive sports and I am so happy I did. Spend the extra 40-60 and this shoe will be a lifesaver down the road.
customer_reviews.author: geoff

customer_reviews.title: Comfort.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fits perfect, I wear a size 9 in Adidas, Nike and New Balance. I just received these shoes less than two weeks ago but I've ran in them 8x so far and they are extremely comfortable. I will edit this in a few weeks once I have more feedback.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Average running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Honestly for the price, I’ll say this running shoes are average. However they are very comfortable but no ankle support.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Stepping Out
customer_reviews.text: I bought these high quality shoes to ease the pain of my plantars faciitis. They did exactly that. Now that my foot has healed I am thoroughly enjoying these shoes on long walks and general use.
customer_reviews.author: Steve G.

customer_reviews.title: A must for middle school kids to be cool, great look
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and cool, I must for any middle school or, to feel comfortable and cool, thanks Amazon prime, and the price was awesome to O👍
customer_reviews.author: Jacksdaddy from  N.C

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Only issue is the back heel is short and slips somewhat. Not a game changer but definitely worth noting.
customer_reviews.author: j k

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is perfect for up to like 15 mile runs. Super confortable, responsive, and fits somewhat small so get half a size smaller than your average running shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Citronex

customer_reviews.title: Overall excellent
customer_reviews.text: I use this ultraboost for walking and jogging and it’s great because I’m a heel striker and slight pronator therefore the support is excellent. The only downside is it takes a little time to get your feet in as well as tighing the knots as I prefer easily-in type of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: salman

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: I think these are the best shoes I’ve ever owned. This is my second pair
customer_reviews.author: Aaron B Peters

customer_reviews.title: comfortable running shoe
customer_reviews.text: I run everyday and I have a mixture of pure boost and ultra boost-these are the best shoes I have found to run in.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes... my second pair
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes, recommended by a physical therapist because of their support
customer_reviews.author: gene ulrich

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Feels your weight is less than what you are :D. Beautiful, comfy and awesome! I'll update the post.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: I use for 5 mile run every other day. So far comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond V. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Love my UltraBOOST ST!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe ! Great for those that need arch support. I’m flat footed and these are the only sneakers I can comfortable work out it. I get a lot of compliments on them too
customer_reviews.author: Kiko_2K19

customer_reviews.title: Cheap for a reason
customer_reviews.text: The tongue on these moves around no Mager how laced... my son says it’s super annoying
customer_reviews.author: Jenster

customer_reviews.title: Wrong description
customer_reviews.text: The description says "orange". The picture has no orange and neither do the shoes...
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Turner

customer_reviews.title: Typically Excellent Adidas Fit
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit of the footbed and support. I like the wrap around feel of this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Gunderson

customer_reviews.title: value for price is high!
customer_reviews.text: needs wear in time. more comfortable every day as your weight and feet customize the shoe. very good looking!
customer_reviews.author: stephen f nagy

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly comfortable and great for running.
customer_reviews.text: Cushy amazing shoes, especially great for flat feet. These are my go to shoes. This is the 3rd pair I've bought.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Gardner

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Always looking for shoes that support but also don't feel like i'm walking barefoot on concrete. This rock!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Purdy

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but a great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Despite being overly priced, and very hard to find, this has been my go to shoe for the past few years. I hope there is better availability and color selection in the future.
customer_reviews.author: R. Betts

customer_reviews.title: Only type of shoes my guy will wear!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my guy. He already owned an older version of these shoes in a different color so I knew he would loves these!
customer_reviews.author: Maluisa

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, stylish running shoe that provides great stability for slight under pronators.
customer_reviews.author: sgb

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was shoddy making me wonder if it was a returned item
customer_reviews.text: I liked the shoes but the packaging was disappointing. The Adidas box had come apart and the paper stuffing inside the shoe was missing on both the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: ds

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: They fir perfectly and seem to be exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: John M Parker IV

customer_reviews.title: Prompt delivery, comfort fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: Prompt delivery (it even came a few days before anticipated delivery date), product just as described, no more, no less, no nonsense. A comfort fit too. Nice shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Lai

customer_reviews.title: awful...
customer_reviews.text: Used shoe being sold as new. clearly stained insoles, hair, etc. How could this be marketed as new?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I had a knee surgery (meniscus), so was looking for extremely soft sole. This one just exactly what I need.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Size a little bigger than like models from years past
customer_reviews.text: Size a little bigger than like models from years past. The shoe tongue was different from in store models. Same feel on the road as older pair.
customer_reviews.author: Bzwnorski

customer_reviews.title: Best on the planet!
customer_reviews.text: Always pleased when I slip my flat feet into these!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Running Shoes Excellent delivery both by Adidas and by Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best. Shoes. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: Ultraboost St are the best shoes I’ve ever worn, may not ever buy another style of shoe
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: Run big, so i got a 7, fits like a glove
customer_reviews.author: Jose Salinas

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the comfort and feel,I wish they were a little more stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Charan

customer_reviews.title: sizing fit perfectly, product as expected
customer_reviews.text: as expected ultra boost was very comfy. I use for sport and casual
customer_reviews.author: MINGTORO BUDIMAN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: most comfortable pair of shoes i’ve ever worn, i highly recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Gali

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great, comfortable shoes. Good for working out and gym use. Fits as expected
customer_reviews.author: Sneha Pawar

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: My spouse likes his Ultra Boost shoes!! They are the most comfortable shoes! No disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie H.

product_meta.title: adidas Originals Men's Ultraboost St
product_meta.description: These men's stability running shoes will remind you what a best-ever run is supposed to feel like. Built with dual-density Boost for increased stability, the shoes have an adidas Primeknit upper with integrated midfoot support for an adaptive and natural fit.
feature_bullets: Torsion System between the heel and forefoot for a stable ride; Comfortable textile lining
Fitcounter molded heel counter provides a natural fit that allows optimal movement of the Achilles
Dual-density Boost cushioning on the medial side provides Energized Stability for a smooth, responsive ride
Stretchweb outsole flexes naturally for an energized ride, while Continental Rubber gives you superior traction
adidas Primeknit upper wraps the foot in adaptive support and ultralight comfort; ARAMIS-inspired build for an improved fit; Fitband helps keep foot in place while allowing natural flexibility
